Article.Title: Introduction
Article.Content:
Shippingguide (Fraktguiden) is a free service from Bring that allows you to calculate prices, time estimations, product information and environmental information (and more). You can get finished rendered HTML, XML API (RESTful), JSON or use our Web Service.

XML Schema Versioning

Fraktguiden makes an effort to always be backwards compatible regarding dataformat for requests and responses of the Web Service.

To achieve this, a SchemaVersion element is used in the request, indicating which version the client is on and what dataformat the client expects in the result. We make an effort not to return new elements in the response when an old schema version is specified.

When changes in the schema are made, the SchemaVersion is incremented by one. The new schema is used at the same endpoint URL as before and uses the same namespace for its XML elements. A TraceMessage element (info message) in the response is added to inform the client that its schema should be updated. Old schema versions might in the future be unsupported.

Regarding the XML API (not Web Services), an XML Schema is not used at all. Therefore, clients of the XML API is expected to handle new elements that appear. Nevertheless, the response will be backwards compatible in that elements are not renamed or deleted.

WSDL (latest schema version)

It is also possible to download specific WSDL / schema versions: 1, 2, 3, 4. Current version is 4.

Fraktguide XML Schema documentation

JSON

We also provide JSON (beta). This enables AJAX-calls and cross-site live retrieval.

JSON mimics the XML API, and you can find more information and examples in the Norwegian JSON example page.

Most notably

  • Append a "callback=yourFunctionName" parameter to get a callback function returned (JSONP)
